title: New on-chip optical sensing technique used to detect multiple flu strains (University of California, Santa ...
text: ( Source : University of California, Santa Cruz ) New chip-based optical sensing technologies developed by researchers at UC Santa Cruz and Brigham Young University enable the rapid detection and identification of multiple biomarkers. In a
